SEARCH
Package com.app.persistence.repository

Interface ProductRepository

All Superinterfaces:
CrudRepository<ProductEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ProductEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ProductEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<ProductEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<ProductEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<ProductEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ProductEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<ProductEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ProductEntity,Long>
public interface ProductRepository extends CrudRepository<ProductEntity>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<ProductEntity>
Repository interface for managing ProductEntity entities in the persistence layer.

This interface extends CrudRepository and JpaSpecificationExecutor to provide CRUD functionality, as well as advanced querying capabilities such as filtering with specifications, retrieving products by category, and performing aggregate statistics on products by category.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      @NonNull @NonNull List<ProductEntity> findAll(org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<ProductEntity> spec)
      Retrieves all products that match the given specification.

      This method allows for dynamic filtering of products based on various criteria, using the Specification.

      Specified by:
      findAll in interface org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<ProductEntity>
      Parameters:
      spec - the specification used for filtering products
      Returns:
      a list of ProductEntity objects that match the specification

    • findByCategory

      List<ProductEntity> findByCategory(String category)
      Retrieves all products that belong to the specified category.
      Parameters:
      category - the product category to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of ProductEntity objects belonging to the specified category

    • findByNameAndCategory

      Optional<ProductEntity> findByNameAndCategory(String name, String category)
      Retrieves a product by its name and category.

      If a product with the given name and category exists, it will be returned; otherwise, an empty Optional is returned.

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the product
      category - the category of the product
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the ProductEntity if found, otherwise an empty Optional

    • getAllCategories

      @Query("select p.category from ProductEntity p\n group by p.category") List<String> getAllCategories()
      Retrieves a list of all unique product categories in the repository.

      This query returns a list of distinct product categories that are available in the database.

      Returns:
      a list of strings representing all unique product categories

    • getCategoryAndPriceStatistic

      @Query(value="WITH category_stats AS (\n SELECT\n p.category AS category,\n AVG(p.price) AS avg_price,\n MIN(p.price) AS min_price,\n MAX(p.price) AS max_price\n FROM products p\n GROUP BY p.category\n )\n SELECT\n cs.category as category,\n cs.avg_price as avgPrice,\n p_min.id AS minId, p_min.name AS minName, p_min.price AS minPrice,\n p_max.id AS maxId, p_max.name AS maxName, p_max.price AS maxPrice\n FROM category_stats cs\n JOIN products p_min ON p_min.price = cs.min_price AND p_min.category = cs.category\n JOIN products p_max ON p_max.price = cs.max_price AND p_max.category = cs.category;", nativeQuery=true) List<PriceStatisticByCategoryProjection> getCategoryAndPriceStatistic()
      Retrieves the price statistics (average, minimum, and maximum price) for each product category, along with the product that has the minimum price and the product that has the maximum price in each category.

      This query calculates aggregate statistics for each category, including the average price, minimum price, and maximum price. It also retrieves the product details for the products with the minimum and maximum prices.

      Returns:
      a list of PriceStatisticByCategoryProjection containing the statistics for each category
